mapper.select: select REPAIR_CODE, FAC_CODE, REPAIR_DATE, REPAIR_COMMENT, COMPANY_CODE, COST, ETC from repair order by repair_code
select REPAIR_CODE, FAC_CODE, REPAIR_DATE, REPAIR_COMMENT, COMPANY_CODE, COST, ETC from repair where REPAIR_CODE = #{repairCode}
select max(repair_code) + 1 as repair_code from repair

select r.repair_code, f.facilities_name, r.repair_date, r.repair_comment, c.company_name, r.cost, r.etc from facilities f, repair r, company c where f.fac_code=r.fac_code and r.company_code=c.company_code
